Please allow me repeat my comment 01org/tbb#6 (comment) on how easy it is to build TBB using makefiles even on Windows. Please take a look at how conda-forge builds TBB package:
All you need is the right gmake package. E.g. you can take m2w64-make from conda-forge channel and execute mingw32-make in order to build TBB (not using mingw as a compiler!). conda-build tool provides desired level of environment isolation so that other mingw tools like sh are not on the way.

body:
Please allow me repeat my comment https://github.com/01org/tbb/issues/6#issuecomment-388075984 on how easy it is to build TBB using makefiles even on Windows. Please take a look at how [conda-forge builds TBB package]( https://github.com/conda-forge/tbb-feedstock/blob/master/recipe/meta.yaml): [![Windows](https://img.shields.io/appveyor/ci/conda-forge/tbb-feedstock/master.svg?label=Windows)](https://ci.appveyor.com/project/conda-forge/tbb-feedstock/branch/master)
All you need is the right `gmake` package. E.g. you can take `m2w64-make` from conda-forge channel and execute `mingw32-make` in order to build TBB (not using mingw as a compiler!). conda-build tool provides desired level of environment isolation so that other mingw tools like `sh` are not on the way.
